original_text: Benjamin shall ravin as a wolf: in the morning he shall devour the prey, and at night he shall divide the spoil.
korean_text: 베냐민은 물어뜯는 이리라 아침에는 빼앗은 것을 먹고 저녁에는 움킨 것을 나누리로다

sentences.original_text: Benjamin shall ravin as a wolf
in the morning he shall devour the prey
and at night he shall divide the spoil
